Author: jl777c#5810
Content: @forkwitch nothing prevents it, i just didnt have time to code and debug the extra hash reveal step

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: being able to prevent usage of the revealed secret is quite tricky, maybe i didnt have a clean solution yet

Author: forkwitch#6080
Content: I know it is hard to code than to speak. But when the output from the secret is locked until event Y happen it could be a solution? So secret is revealed but not the full requirement to spend connected outputs.

Author: forkwitch#6080
Content: I am certain you understand though.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i think an atomic secret reveal is needed, so the dicebet side needs to commit the hash of his entropy and then somehow both sides need to reveal the raw entropy at the same time, otherwise the side that didnt could reorg the chain when it is advantageous

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: some sort of commit followed by reveal phase that cant be 51% attacked would be needed, sort of the opposite of channels CC that relies on a revealed secret to still be revealed even if the payment tx is invalidated via reorg
